executor_failure_loop.description: Executor enters infinite loop when execute_phase() returns before exhausting max_attempts (due to Doctor/health checks). Phase remains QUEUED in database, main loop re-picks it, causing infinite retry cycle.
executor_failure_loop.root_cause: State management split between instance attributes (attempt_index) and database (phase.state). When execute_phase() returns early, database not updated to FAILED, causing re-selection.
executor_failure_loop.impact: Blocks long autonomous runs, wastes token budget on infinite retries
executor_failure_loop.proposed_fix: Database-backed state persistence - move attempt tracking to database, execute single attempt per call, atomic state updates
